[Tower Shield Mastery](/Feats.aspx?ID=3588) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Knights of Lastwall](/Sources.aspx?ID=123) pg. 75

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092)

</column>

---

You've learned how to maximize the defensive abilities of your [tower shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=4). You are constantly [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) and can use the additional action only to [Take Cover](/Actions.aspx?ID=90) behind your tower shield after you have Raised it.
name: Tower Shield Mastery
